summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Sunday 24 October to end of Sunday 24 October GMT
description: Sunday is forecast to be overcast with sunny intervals.<br/><br/>A fresh southerly or south-westerly breeze is expected throughout the day. The breeze should ensure good atmospheric mixing and dispersal of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
